---
title: "Bayesian Linear Mixed Modell for the UCAP data set"
format: html
editor: visual
---

## Load packages and data set

```{r}
library(brms)
library("readr")
```

```{r}
trials <- read_csv("output/trials.csv")
head(trials)
```

## Bayesian LMM with brms

```{r}
mod <- brm(N2 ~ 1 + n_b + (1 |participant_id),
           data = trials)
```

```{r}
summary(mod)
plot(mod, variable = c("b_n_bnormal"))
```
